# Node.js module for Launchpack.io

Using this module you can dynamically download your sevice api keys from Launchpack.io

## Install

Stop your node server if it is running.

Run this in your terminal:
``` shell
npm install addons
```

Add this to your javascript, server.js or otherwise:
``` javascript
var addons = require('addons');
addons();
```

Set environment variables and restart your server:
``` javascript
ADDONS_APP_ID='app_97308f3f-948a-4f90-879a-ea3155e5f6d7' ADDONS_APP_TOKEN='pyw5WBzdfFBh5ta5K63g' node server.js
```
